annotations.description: The Mojito Criollo #2 was most probably created by bartender Constantino Ribalaigua Vert the head bartender at La Floridita Bar in Havana Cuba sometime in th...
annotations.title: Mojito Criollo No. 2

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Old Tom Gin
1oz (30ml) Lime Juice
.5oz (15ml) Simple Syrup
8-10 Mint Leaves
1 Sugar Cube
Top Soda Water
Mint Sprig Garnish

Muddle mint, sugars, and limes. 
Shake and pour into collins over crushed ice. 
Top with soda. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Eiyw2BB0_Es
title: Mojito Criollo No. 2
